inscription:
Inscription

ULC, in black: [23]; on back, in pencil: [33], [03557] and two illegible inscriptions
medium: Black and white chalk on blue paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, November 21, 1974, no. 22, as Venetian School, late 16th century, for £120, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d.2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Standing Draped Man with a Staff
